responses.rationale: Describes 'Veterinary trials to test bird flu vaccines have started' (capability) without calming language.
Describes 'secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine' (preparedness) without calming language.
Describes 'secures up to 665,000 doses' and 'option for a further 40 million vaccines' (preparedness) without calming language.
Describes 'will be jointly procured' (capability/process) without calming language.
Describes the intended use of doses ('intended for those most exposed') (preparedness implementation) without calming language.
Describes 'are also in the process of securing preventative vaccine doses' (preparedness) without calming language.
